title: Trident Case Cyclops Case for HTC EVO 4G, Yellow - 1 Pack - Case - Retail Packaging - Yellow
features: Constructed from high impact-resistant polycarbonate and double-enforced with a shock absorbing silicone outer-ring.
Anti-scratch, anti-glare, bubble-free, clear PET screen protector shields screen from finger prints, smudges, scratches and moisture while maintaining complete touch screen interactivity.
Camera lens and logo-opening protected by clear, durable PET film to keep out dust and debris. Headphone jack and dock connectors fully protected when not in use.
The back of the case also includes an opening for the EVO’s kickstand, maintaining the full functionality of all the EVO’s innovative features.
Audio jack extender included to provide 100% compatibility connection to ALL types of 3.5mm audio jacks. Ensures easy use with car audio cords, home stereo systems, etc
description: Description:The Cyclops for EVO offers the renowned Trident Case level of maximum protection without sacrificing the sleekness or functionality intended by the original designers at HTC.Features:The Cyclops for EVO offers the renowned Trident Case level of maximum protection without sacrificing the sleekness or functionality intended by the original designers at HTC.Total Protection: Constructed from high impact-resistant polycarbonate and double-enforced with a shock absorbing silicone outer-ring.Clear PET Screen Shield: Anti-scratch, anti-glare, bubble-free, clear PET screen protector shields screen from finger prints, smudges, scratches and moisture while maintaining complete touch screen interactivity.Ergonomical: Carefully designed for a reliable, comfortable, non-slip hold.Anti-Dust Design: Camera lens and logo-opening protected by clear, durable PET film to keep out dust and debris. Headphone jack and dock connectors fully protected when not in use.Media Viewing: The back of the case also includes an opening for the EVO’s kickstand, maintaining the full functionality of all the EVO’s innovative features.Velvet Touch: Multi-coated rubberized finish encases the device for a smooth feel and sleek appearance. Available in 9 different colors.Bonus Audio Jack Extension: Audio jack extender included to provide 100% compatibility connection to ALL types of 3.5mm audio jacks. Ensures easy use with car audio cords, home stereo systems, etc.Camera Flaw Resolved:HTC designed the EVO with the camera lens sitting flush on the back of the case. This makes the lens extremely vulnerable to scratches and even cracks. The Cyclops rectifies this issue by elevating the lens to help prevent scratches and surrounding the camera with 360 degrees of polycarbonate protection to avoid cracks.Technical Specs: Plastic covers are made of polycarbonate and the outer-wrap is silicone. All materials are 100% RoHS compliant.
